Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to merging the department of juvenile justice and the administration for children’s services, and to repeal chapter 28 of such charter and subparagraph iii of paragraph 5 of subdivision a of section 12-307 of such code in relation thereto.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Merging the department of juvenile justice and the administration for children’s services.

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to merging the department of juvenile justice and the administration for children’s services, and to repeal chapter 28 of such charter and subparagraph iii of paragraph 5 of subdivision a of section 12-307 of such code in relation thereto.
